cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

project(external C CXX)

if(BUILD_SWIG)
  message(STATUS "SWIG Building in process")
  include(swig)
  message(STATUS "SWIG Building finished successfully.")
endif(BUILD_SWIG)
